entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1100 metres in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
